content: it is available here in an instant download immediately after purchase is complete the checkered card holder wallet is the perfect fun functional option to carry around your cards money bills and more making your own accessories/decorations is a great way to help slow down the average use of harmful materials and is an overall great hobby to pick up great alternative to plastics language english us terms skill level advanced beginner - i would recommend this pattern to anyone with the knowledge of the basic stitches used in crochet and color changing materials yarn detailed in the pdf crochet hook 4 00 mm g-6 other needed materials a yarn needle a needle with a curved tip is preferred scissors small sew-on snap embroidery needle embroidery thread finished size the approximate size of the finished project is around- 5 wide and 3 high when closed and 5 wide and 6 25 high when opened
